00039 template <class TImage,class T> 
00040 class ImageIteratorXYZ: public ImageIterator <TImage,T>
00041         {
00042

00051                  {
00052                  this->ptr=other.ptr;
00053                  this->im=other.im;
00054                 
00055                  if(this->ptr==this->im->getData() )

00071         inline ImageIteratorXYZ<TImage, T> &operator++() {
00072                 this->ptr++; 
00073                 this->x++;
00074                 if(this->x == this->im->getSizeX())
00075                         {
00076                         this->x=0;
00077                         this->y++;
00078                         }
00079                 if(this->y == this->im->getSizeY())
00080                         {
00081                         x=0;

00084                         }
